reviews.text: The billing rollover CRON job is misconfigured with an invalid schedule: `24:60 UTC on 30 Feb`.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes a correct schedule for a job.

reviews.text: This hotfix updates the schedule to `00:00 UTC on the last day of the month`.
reviews.reason_text: Sets an enforceable schedule update for a job.

reviews.text: The PR must include a unit test validating correct trigger behavior across leap years, 30- and 31-day months.
reviews.reason_text: Specifies the inclusion of a unit test for trigger behavior across specific date scenarios.

reviews.text: As part of the code-freeze policy, the PR is gatedâ€”**next evaluated trigger must resolve to `2025-02-28 00:00 UTC`**, with proof via test output or logs.
reviews.reason_text: Enforces a trigger resolution to a specific date with proof.

reviews.text: Please coordinate with the scheduler maintainer if changes affect adjacent jobs.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes coordination but lacks enforceable action.

reviews.text: All reviewers should verify boundary cases before approving.
reviews.reason_text: Imposes a reviewer responsibility but lacks enforceable action.
